public class DecisionInferences

Performs necessary inference when a decision or something dependent on a decision changes.

Method Detail

updateDecisionStatus

public java.util.Vector<RationaleStatus> updateDecisionStatus(Decision ourDec)
Updates the status of the decision. This includes - calculating support for all arguments (evaluation), checking for errors in the arguments for/against, and checking for tradeoff violations.

Parameters:
ourDec - - the decision being updated
Returns:
- a vector of status that needs to be displayed

updateOnDelete

public java.util.Vector<RationaleStatus> updateOnDelete(Decision ourDec)
Make any status updates needed when a decision is deleted

Parameters:
ourDec - - the decision that is being deleted
Returns:
a vector containing status updates to be displayed
